Title: The Batman vs. Dracula
Director: Michael Goguen, Seung Eun Kim, Sam Liu, Brandon Vietti
Writer: Duane Capizzi, Bob Kane (characters), Michael Jelenic (story editor)
Actors: Rino Romano, Peter Stormare, Tara Strong, Tom Kenny
Plot: Batman faces off against the original creature of the night, Count Dracula, who has been unintentionally resurrected by the Penguin.
